name: Forest Killers Remake
description:
Forest Killers is the remake version of The Forest Killer (https://mayama.itch.io/the-forest-killer).

It is a free to play single player/multiplayer game inspired by Slenderman with the objective of searching for 4 notes within a forest, with a new monster appearing on each note.

-------------------------------------------------

Your comment on the game is appreciated.

This is a public Beta version

IMPORTANT: WE RECOMMEND TO SET GRAPHICS INSIDE THE GAME

Version information:

v0.5.0 Beta

- New menu

- The lighting was rendered

- The sound was calibrated

- Best indicated objectives

- Difficulty calibrated.

-------------------------------------------------- ---------------------

Technical data:

Platform: PC | exe

Languages: Spanish, English, French and others

Developed By: YomismoCompany

Minimum requirements:

OS: Windows 7/8/10

Processor: Duo Core 2

RAM: 2GB/4GB.

Free hard disk space: 740 MB
